| HistoryText             = 
While leaving to find a new home in [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]], the [[Tunnelers (Earth-616)|Tunnelers]] ran into a human street gang called the [[Savage Wolf Gang (Earth-616)|Savage Wolf Gang]] who tried to rob them. The Tunnelers fought back, ending in the deaths of two of the three gang members and the wounding of [[Masque (Earth-616)|Masque]]. [[Blow-Hard (Earth-616)|Blow-Hard]] was shot through the chest by a member of the Savage Wolf Gang. The battle later led to a confrontation with the police, where [[Scaleface (Earth-616)|Scaleface]] was shot dead.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 11}}
